column2: Make the most of RMIT with our support services. Achieve your study goals stay happy and healthy and know there is support and assistance when you need it.
Here are a selection of commonly used RMIT services. Click one of the links below to access them.
RMIT University Student Union is a 100% student-run organisation. Check out their website to learn more.
Click one of the links below to check out upcoming important dates for your course
